DOC.brief_title: A Randomized Double Blind , Placebo Controlled Balanced 4-Way Crossover Study To Assess The Efficacy Of Single Oral Doses
DOC.criteria: Erectile dysfunction , previous good response oral treatment erectile dysfunction . Patients high blood pressure certain heart condition ( e.g . angina , heart failure ) , regardless whether treat . Patients nitrate alphablocker medication .
